VALUE: What is love? Baby don't hurt me, don't hurt me, no more! WHAT IS LOVE!?

36mX=-3yWYvQV$j/.IHU: What's up, bread boy?
bruh~
Why do you only say bruh? It's   really annoying.
bruh
Hey, stop it--
bruh
Why do I even bother with you?
bruh...
I'm here too, sussy baka!
Looks like Grill coded in the    'swap' block.
U- UwU senpai~
Gross.
Hello, Player.
This is the official demo of     Polcompistan High: Love Story!
If you spot any glitches or have any recommendations,
please let us know in the        Polcompistan discord server.
And with that, enjoy!
Are you ready to begin a new     game?
Oh man, that was one weird dream.What time is it?
OH SHIT! I'm late for school!    Fuuuuuck!
[MOSS runs downstairs to find a  cold breakfast.]
[Attached is a note reading “Havefun at school today! -Mom”]
Damn it! Ugh, I don't have time  to heat this up and eat. I'll    just settle with toast.
[MOSS grabs a slice of bread and puts it in the toaster.]
I heard we're gonna be doing a   project in Science class soon. I wonder what that's all about...?
I'll know when I get there.      Junior year's painful enough as  it is--
Why do they gotta pile up even   more work on us?
[The toaster dings. MOSS pulls   out his breakfast.]
This is gonna be one hell of a   day, I already know THAT much.
[MOSS leaves the house, and bikesto school.]
[He's walking to the Science     classroom...]
Fucking nerd. The fuck are you   gonna do, cry? Get the fuck outtahere.
Aw, man, you made me miss class! Catch ya later, loser.
…You alright?
Yeah… that guy’s just… whatever. I-I should probably head to classnow. You should, too.
Wait, are you in Science right   now?
Oh, hehe~ I am.
Yeah, I thought I'd recognized   you from somewhere.
Well, it was n-nice talking to   you!
Nice talking to you too. Anyway, I gotta go now. The Teacher's    gonna kick my ass.
R-right behind you...
Oh, glad you two could finally   join us.
You’re only… 20 minutes late,    MOSS.
And MECH, didn’t you go to the   bathroom 10 minutes ago?
I-I'm SO sorry!!
Sorry ma’am, I overslept. It     won’t happen again.
Just take your seats.
As I was saying, we will be      holding the annual science fair.
Your projects are DUE on the     27th, and we’ll hold the fair on the 1st.
This will be a group effort. I   will decide your groups, but you can pick your own topic.
Any questions?
…No? Good.
[MOSS zones out.]
Sorry ma’am, I overslept. It     won’t happen again.
Alright. For group 6, let’s have…how about ERWIN, MECH,           BREAD EATER, MITSUU, and…
MOSS, as well.
I need to know your topic by the end of class. Decide your group  roles and work schedule, too.
bruh
Ugh!! Why do I have to be with   all of YOU?
The teacher assigned us randomly.And besides, it’s not like WE    wanna be with you, either.
…Can we go around the circle and introduce ourselves? I haven’t   even seen half of you guys.
You first.
H-Hey everyone…! I’m MECH, as youmay-- uh-- already know, hehe.   I’m transgender, male to female--
Ew.
U-uh…
Anyway~ I really like poetry. I  have a whole notebook full of    stuff I’ve written…
--M-MITSUU, how about you say    something?
‘Kay.
I’m MITSUU, and I enjoy the      culinary arts. I usually make a  lot of meals at home,
and I take a keen interest in    Japanese cuisine.
…I think ERWIN should introduce  himself now.
HEY, I’m my own person, alright? I’ll do whatever I want.
So I’m ERWIN, and I’m really intoflowers. I actually have a gardenin my backyard~
The colors are so pretty…
What? I can’t like flowers       because they look pretty!?
That’s like saying you can’t likewater because it keeps you       hydrated!!
Yeah, okay, nobody said anything.
Yeah, but you looked at me       weird!! Just stop doing that if  you don’t have anything to say!!
[Awkward silence fills the room.]
...Okay?
Well, my name’s MOSS, and I’m    into History.
I could spend, like, days talkingabout World War One.
I have a ton of books on the     battles, the countries that      participated,
the economy during the time, the brutal war crimes com--
Okayyyyyy, that’s pretty cool~
Maybe you could teach me about   it, like in study hall or        something--
Oh, so KILLING is cool but       FLOWERS aren’t? You’re a bunch ofpsychopaths--
Hey, can you knock it off?
Make me.
C-can everyone just calm down~!?
...Fine.
What about you… what’s your name…bread eater?
bruh
What...?
bruh
I'm pretty sure all he says is   bruh.
Alright, whatever, sure.
So, what kinda roles are we gonnahave? I’m obviously the leader.
Why the fuck are you the leader?
Because I want to be. Why does itmatter? You wanna be the leader?
No, I just wanted to question    you.
bruh
Let’s not make this conversation worse than it already is. Let's  just let MITSUU be the leader.
So… What’s our project gonna be  about?
You tell me.
Well, we could do something with chemistry.
Yeah, that sounds like a good    idea. We should talk about       nuclear reactivity.
What? No!! We should make        something pretty, like crystals.
Are you 5 years old? Maybe we    should study your neurology,
so we can find out why you       thought that was a good idea.
Piss off, weeb!
(Here we go again.)
Okay, first off, a weeaboo is    defined as someone who’s obsessedwith Japanese culture--
Yeah, that’s you. You just said--
I only said I liked Japanese     cuisine. That doesn’t mean I     have, like,
anime body pillows laying        around--
I bet you fucking do! You        probably have a Hatsune Miku     cover, pervert!
Will you stop being a little     brat? You’re gonna make this a   terrible experience.
Cope.
Seethe.
[The bell rings.]
That was the bell. I still don’t have a project topic from        MITSUU’s group.
Good job, guys.
We wouldn’t have wasted so much  time arguing if it weren’t for   MITSUU.
I-I know it was just a joke, but we could do something on         neurology.
Well, we better figure out what  that’ll be quick. I don't wanna  miss next period.
It better be something pretty,   though.
What does that even mean? What   could possibly be “pretty” about a brain?
Y’know, a lot of people think    love is a beautiful aspect of thehuman mind.
U-um… How are we gonna research  that? Do any of us even have a   romantic partner?
I’m sure there’s some research   papers on chemical attraction    between people.
Even then, it’s not like we      couldn’t…
Hm?
Huh? --Nothing. I think you’re   right, though. That would be an  interesting topic to research.
I guarantee nobody else will do  it.
What? Got any objections?
Will you stop being a dick!?
Fine, we’ll do your stupid love  project. But not because I want  to.
And everyone else?
O-okay~!
Alright by me.
bruh
Is that a yes?
bruh
Whatever. It's a majority vote atthis point anyway.
I’ll go tell the teacher what ourtopic is. You should all get     going.
[It's after school, and MOSS is  biking home after this peculiar  day.]
What the hell was science class?
I kinda regret agreeing to make  our topic about love, but it was a last minute decision.
Guess I can’t complain, though--
Our group is mismatched, it’ll   probably be fun to see how this  unravels.
U-um… How are we gonna research  that? Do any of us even have a   romantic partner?
